item.title: Foggy morning
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: It was really foggy on all my way to office this morning, I just wish it comes with rain afterward.
item.content:encoded: It was really foggy on all my way to office this morning, I just wish it comes with rain afterward.

item.title: Heavy rain
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: It’s heavily raining now, super heavy. Luckily I got home earlier than usual before.
item.content:encoded:
It’s heavily raining now, super heavy.

Luckily I got home earlier than usual before.

item.title: 17 hours on the plane
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: Well, all because of thunderstorm in Beijing, so we spent 5 hours in Hohhot. It is said it was one of the worst day for Beijing airport, as Tianjin was full of the flights targeting Beijing, then Hohhot, then Shijiazhuang, and then Jinan, and at the same time we don’t know how many domestic flights [...]
item.content:encoded:
Well, all because of thunderstorm in Beijing, so we spent 5 hours in Hohhot. It is said it was one of the worst day for Beijing airport, as Tianjin was full of the flights targeting Beijing, then Hohhot, then Shijiazhuang, and then Jinan, and at the same time we don’t know how many domestic flights just didn’t take off.

Crazy day, but good to be home, at last

item.title: It’s … soooooo cold
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: I cannot believe it is late May now, it’s soooooooo cold here and we turned on heater last night again. So, there is no plan for memorial day, staying at home, doing some random stuffs, and prepare for the coming work days.
item.content:encoded:
I cannot believe it is late May now, it’s soooooooo cold here and we turned on heater last night again.

So, there is no plan for memorial day, staying at home, doing some random stuffs, and prepare for the coming work days.

item.title: Santa Cruz beach
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: I cannot remember when was the last time came here, but sand here is much more better then Halfmoon Bay, though sea looks dirty (too much sand makes it muggy).
item.content:encoded: I cannot remember when was the last time came here, but sand here is much more better then Halfmoon Bay, though sea looks dirty (too much sand makes it muggy).

item.title: Start raining
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: It’s May now but … it has been raining for 4 days, weird enough.
item.content:encoded: It’s May now but … it has been raining for 4 days, weird enough.

item.title: It’s cold
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: It’s pretty cold in the morning, I still need to open heater … Thinking of it is almost May, it is really weird. It seems same thing in Beijing as well, people are still wearing sweater.
item.content:encoded:
It’s pretty cold in the morning, I still need to open heater … Thinking of it is almost May, it is really weird.

It seems same thing in Beijing as well, people are still wearing sweater.
